title: My Little Pony v2.2.0n (Mega Mod)
description:
Saddle up for adventure with Twilight Sparkle & friends!

After being locked away in the moon for centuries, Nightmare Moon is set free and spreading night across Ponyville! Only Twilight Sparkle and her friends can free Ponyville from her grasp and bring light and friendship back to the land. Help them rebuild the town and reach their dreams in exciting quests!

* Your favorite ponies are here: Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Applejack and more!
* Make your Ponyville the most magical place in Equestria and explore Sweet Apple Acres and Canterlot.
* Play fun mini-games with your ponies: Ball Bounce, Apple-Picking, Magic Wings, Telescope, Crystal Mine and Equestria Girls Dance game!
* Interact with your friends and feel the Magic of Friendship!
* Enjoy official TV show voice talents featured in the game!

What's New:

Unlock the Chest of Harmony and bring even more magic to your town with Twilight Castle! Find this and more in this latest update based on the show's 4th season finale!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Help each of the Mane Six in a unique quest to gather the Gifts of Friendship, open the Chest of Harmony and unlock your own Twilight Castle!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ But something evil has also come to town: Lord Tirek. You must defeat him before all hope is lost!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ There are also new ponies, bigger shops, & a map expansion to fit all the fun!
